verses.verse: רוּחִ֣י <S%H7307><s%> My breath חֻ֭בָּלָה <S%H2254><s%> is corrupt יָמַ֥י <S%H3117><s%> my days נִזְעָ֗כוּ <S%H2193><s%> are extinct קְבָרִ֥ים <S%H6913><s%> the graves לִֽי׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הֲ֭תֻלִים <S%H2049><s%> [Are there] not mockers עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against וּ֝בְהַמְּרוֹתָ֗ם <S%H4784><s%> in their provocation תָּלַ֥ן <S%H3885><s%> continue עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> with me? and doth not mine eye

שִֽׂימָה־ <S%H7760><s%> Lay down נָּ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now עָרְבֵ֣נִי <S%H6148><s%> now put me in a surety עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with מִֽי <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְיָדִ֥י <S%H3027><s%> hands יִתָּקֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8628><s%> with thee who [is] he [that] will strike

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֭בָּם <S%H3820><s%> their heart צָפַ֣נְתָּ <S%H6845><s%> For thou hast hid מִּשָּׂ֑כֶל <S%H7922><s%> from understanding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תְרֹמֵֽם׃ <S%H7311><s%> therefore shalt thou not exalt

לְ֭חֵלֶק <S%H2506><s%> flattery יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> He that speaketh רֵעִ֑ים <S%H7453><s%> to [his] friends וְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> even the eyes בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> of his children תִּכְלֶֽנָה׃ <S%H3615><s%> shall fail

וְֽ֭הִצִּגַנִי <S%H3322><s%> He hath made לִמְשֹׁ֣ל <S%H4914><s%> me also a byword עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְתֹ֖פֶת <S%H8611><s%> I was as a tabret לְפָנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> and aforetime אֶֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> am

וַתֵּ֣כַהּ <S%H3543><s%> also is dim מִכַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H3708><s%> by reason of sorrow עֵינִ֑י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye וִֽיצֻרַ֖י <S%H3338><s%> and all my members כַּצֵּ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> [are] as a shadow כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> and all

יָשֹׁ֣מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> [men] shall be astonied יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> Upright עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְ֝נָקִ֗י <S%H5355><s%> at this and the innocent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against חָנֵ֥ף <S%H2611><s%> himself against the hypocrite יִתְעֹרָֽר׃ <S%H5782><s%> shall stir up

וְיֹאחֵ֣ז <S%H270><s%> also shall hold צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> on his way וּֽטֳהָר־ <S%H2891><s%> be make יָ֝דַ֗יִם <S%H3027><s%> hands יֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> shall be אֹֽמֶץ׃ <S%H555><s%> stronger and stronger

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> But כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all תָּ֭שֻׁבוּ <S%H7725><s%> as for you all do ye return וּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come now נָ֑א <S%H4994><s%> now וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> for I cannot find בָכֶ֣ם חָכָֽם׃ <S%H2450><s%> [one] wise

יָמַ֣י <S%H3117><s%> My days עָ֭בְרוּ <S%H5674><s%> are past זִמֹּתַ֣י <S%H2154><s%> my purposes נִתְּק֑וּ <S%H5423><s%> are broken off מ֖וֹרָשֵׁ֣י <S%H4180><s%> [even] the thoughts לְבָבִֽי׃ <S%H3824><s%> of my heart

לַ֭יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> the night לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> into day יָשִׂ֑ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> They change א֝֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light קָר֥וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] short מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> because חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֲ֭קַוֶּה <S%H6960><s%> If I wait שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> the grave בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> [is] mine house בַּ֝חֹ֗שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in the darkness רִפַּ֥דְתִּי <S%H7502><s%> I have made יְצוּעָֽי׃ <S%H3326><s%> my bed

לַשַּׁ֣חַת <S%H7845><s%> to corruption קָ֭רָאתִי <S%H7121><s%> I have said אָ֣בִי <S%H1><s%> Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אִמִּ֥י <S%H517><s%> [Thou art] my mother וַ֝אֲחֹתִ֗י <S%H269><s%> and my sister לָֽרִמָּֽה׃ <S%H7415><s%> to the worm

וְ֭אַיֵּה <S%H346><s%> Where אֵפ֣וֹ <S%H645><s%> And where [is] now תִקְוָתִ֑י <S%H8615><s%> expectation וְ֝תִקְוָתִ֗י <S%H8615><s%> expectation מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> any יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7789><s%> who shall see

בַּדֵּ֣י <S%H905><s%> to the bars שְׁאֹ֣ל <S%H7585><s%> of the pit תֵּרַ֑דְנָה <S%H3381><s%> They shall go down אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in עָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> [is] in the dust נָֽחַת׃ <S%H5183><s%> when [our] rest ס
